name: Nicless
deskripsi: NicLess is a web-based dashboard application designed to support users in quitting smoking through progress tracking, daily check-ins, and health education. The platform features real-time smoke-free duration tracking, estimated money savings, mood tracking, daily tap-ins, and health tips filtered by withdrawal symptoms. With a clean and intuitive interface, NicLess aims to increase self-awareness, consistency, and motivation toward a healthier, smoke-free lifestyle.

name: Company Profile
deskripsi: Kita Kreatif is a research center team that aims to become an innovative, independent, and leading research center in the fields of Marketing Communication, Tourism, and Creative Economy.

name: AutiScan
deskripsi: AutiScan is an application developed to detect autism in children. Users only need to input a picture of the child's face, and the system will automatically classify it and return the results in a format that is easy for users to understand.

name: Sispustal
deskripsi: Digital Library System to simplify the library development process and provide convenience to library users in facilitating the process of searching for reading materials.

name: Sikelim
deskripsi: The Iskandar Muda Waste Management Information System is a web-based application designed to facilitate waste management and monitoring in the Iskandar Muda environment. This system aims to improve efficiency, transparency, and accuracy in the management of medical and non-medical waste.

name: Note App
deskripsi: Notes App is a web-based note-taking application that allows users to create, manage, and store notes practically and efficiently.

name: BookShelf App
deskripsi: Bookshelf App is a website designed to store and manage book data, both those that have been read and those that are still on the reading list.
